w4h.visualization module¶

The visualization module contains functions for creating plots and data vizualizations from outputs from w4h.run()

w4h.visualization.plot_cross_section(dataset, profile=None, profile_direction=None, xcoord='x', ycoord='y', show_layers=True, verbose=False, **kwargs)[source]¶
